A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My wife and I thought this was a great movie. Our only critique would be that it was a little long\, but that may be because of the 25 minutes of previews before the movie even started!

I thought the whole controversial ending with Luke was actually perfect. Very well done\, and necessary to move the story along into the future. I liked that it did some things that were unexpected and not predictable in the Star Wars world. 

I would definitely see this again.
